title: Chelsea transfers: Sporting confirm Geovany Quenda and Dario Essugo agreements for Premier League switch
text:
Chelsea transfers: Sporting confirm Geovany Quenda and Dario Essugo agreements for Premier League switch
Geovany Quenda was of interest to Manchester United before Chelsea moved ahead of them to seal the transfer of the teenage winger, who is expected to move to Stamford Bridge in 2026
Wednesday 19 March 2025 22:56, UK
Sporting have confirmed an agreement with Chelsea for the transfers of Geovany Quenda and Dario Essugo.
More to followâ€¦
This is a breaking news story that is being updated and more details will be published shortly. Please refresh this page for the latest updates.
